dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 893 audio samples, crowd-sourced from 4352 participants using a COVID-19 Sounds app, aimed at detecting COVID-19 through voice analysis.
dcterms:title: Cambridge University dataset

dcterms:description: A feature set containing 6373 static features derived from low-level descriptor contours, used for analyzing cough and speech related to COVID-19.
dcterms:title: COMPARE Acoustic Feature Set

dcterms:creator: A. B. Nassif
I. Shahin
M. Bader

N. Werghi
dcterms:description: A dataset of 1159 sound samples obtained from 592 participants, including 213 COVID-19 infected patients, used for deep learning algorithms in COVID-19 detection.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 1159 sound samples
